config.@wgEnableManageWiki: Boolean. Whether Special:ManageWiki should work on the wiki.
config.@wgManageWikiExtensions: Array. An array of extensions enabled within the wiki farm.
config.@wgManageWikiPermissionsAdditional: Array. Similar to $wgGroupPermissions except ManageWiki merges this into its own system. Should be an array of Blacklisted groups/rights.
config.@wgManageWikiPermissionsBlacklistGroups: Array. An array of usergroups which ManageWiki can't manage. Will prevent users creating same named groups as well.
config.@wgManageWikiPermissionsBlacklistRights: Array. An array of user rights that ManageWiki can not manage and assign on wiki.
config.@wgManageWikiPermissionsManagement: Boolean. Whether ManageWiki should control group management within MediaWiki. Enable with care and caution!
config.@wgManageWikiSettings: Array. An array of settings that can be managed through Special:ManageWiki
